content:
```sql
SELECT
	p.project_code AS é¡¹ç›®ç¼–ç ,
	p.project_name AS é¡¹ç›®åç§°,
	count( e.id ) AS å»ºç­‘æ•°é‡,
	count( d.id ) AS è®¾å¤‡æ•°é‡ 
FROM
	`emp_project` p
	LEFT JOIN `architecture` e ON p.id = e.`project_id` 
	AND e.`is_active` = 1 
	AND e.`level` = 30 
	AND e.`source_type` = 'Z'
	LEFT JOIN `project_device` d ON p.id = d.project_id 
	AND d.is_active = 1 
	AND d.device_type IN ( 1, 2, 3, 4 ) 
WHERE
	p.`is_active` = 1 
	AND p.`source_type` = 'Z' 
GROUP BY
	p.id
```

```sql
SELECT
	p.project_code AS é¡¹ç›®ç¼–ç ,
	p.project_name AS é¡¹ç›®åç§°,
	en.encount AS å»ºç­‘æ•°é‡,
	de.decount AS è®¾å¤‡æ•°é‡ 
FROM
	`emp_project` p
	LEFT JOIN ( SELECT `project_id`, count(*) AS encount FROM `architecture` WHERE `level` = 30 AND `is_active` = 1 
	AND `source_type` = 'Z' GROUP BY `project_id` ) en ON p.id = en.`project_id`
	LEFT JOIN (
	SELECT
		`project_id`,
		count(*) AS decount 
	FROM
		`project_device` 
	WHERE
		`is_active` = 1 
		AND `device_type` IN ( 1, 2, 3, 4 ) 
	GROUP BY
		`project_id` 
	) de ON p.id = de.project_id 
WHERE
	p.`is_active` = 1 
	AND p.`source_type` = 'Z'
```
